member.summary: Creates a new ApiException with the specified details.

Raw response body content (optional, defaults to null).

member.summary: Generic API exception with typed result for structured error responses.

member.summary: Creates a new ApiException with a typed result.
member.param: HTTP status code of the error response.
Response headers from the failed request.
Typed error result from the API.
Inner exception that caused this failure.
member.remarks: Parameter order maintained for backwards compatibility with generated clients. For the non-generic ApiException, use the simplified constructor with optional parameters.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson
member.summary:
Static helper for JSON serialization/deserialization that always uses Bannou's standard configuration. This is the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH for JSON serialization settings across all Bannou services and SDKs.
USE THIS INSTEAD OF JsonSerializer.Deserialize/Serialize DIRECTLY.
This ensures consistent behavior across the codebase: - Case-insensitive property matching (handles both PascalCase and camelCase) - Enums serialize as strings matching C# enum names (e.g., "GettingStarted") - Null values are ignored when writing - Strict number handling (no string-to-number coercion) - Proper handling of all Bannou model types
Example usage: var model = BannouJson.Deserialize<MyModel>(jsonString); var json = BannouJson.Serialize(model);

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.Options
member.summary: Standard JSON serializer options used throughout Bannou. This is the canonical configuration - all JSON operations should use this.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.Deserialize``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize JSON string to object using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.DeserializeRequired``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize JSON string to object using Bannou's standard configuration. Throws if result is null.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.Serialize``1(``0)
member.summary: Serialize object to JSON string using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.Serialize(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Serialize object to JSON string using Bannou's standard configuration with explicit type.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.Deserialize(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserialize JSON string to object of a runtime type using Bannou's standard configuration. Use this when the type is only known at runtime (e.g., event dispatch).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.Deserialize``1(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Deserialize from UTF-8 bytes using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.summary: Serialize object to UTF-8 bytes using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.summary: Async deserialize from stream using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.SerializeAsync``1(System.IO.Stream,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Async serialize to stream using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.SerializeToElement``1(``0)
member.summary: Serialize object to JsonElement using Bannou's standard configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BannouJson.ApplyBannouSettings(System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Apply Bannou's standard JSON serializer settings to an existing options object. Use this when configuring external libraries (MassTransit, etc.) that provide their own options.
member.returns: The configured options object for fluent chaining

member.summary: Extension methods for JSON serialization using Bannou's standard configuration. Provides a fluent API for common JSON operations.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseClientEvent
member.summary: Base class for all server-to-client push events delivered via WebSocket. All client events MUST inherit from this class and include these fields. The eventName field is used for whitelist validation in Connect service.

remarks.para: This class is the single source of truth for base client event properties. All derived events generated via NSwag will inherit from this class.
Implements IBannouEvent for uniform event handling in message taps.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseClientEvent.EventName
P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseClientEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance. Used for deduplication, tracing, and correlation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseClientEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When the event was generated (ISO 8601 format, UTC).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseServiceEvent
member.summary: Base class for all service-to-service events via RabbitMQ pub/sub. All service events MUST inherit from this class and include these fields.

remarks.para: This class is the single source of truth for base service event properties. All derived events generated via NSwag will inherit from this class.
Implements IBannouEvent for uniform event handling in message taps.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseServiceEvent.EventName
member.summary: Unique event type identifier (e.g., "session.connected"). Convention: {service}.{event_name} or {domain}.{event_name}

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseServiceEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance (UUID string). Used for deduplication, tracing, and correlation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.BaseServiceEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When the event was created (ISO 8601 format, UTC).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.DiscriminatedRecordConverter`1
member.summary: Base JSON converter for discriminated record hierarchies. Reads a string discriminator property from the JSON object, maps it to a concrete sealed record type, and deserializes accordingly. Write serializes the concrete runtime type directly (the discriminator property is included naturally as a record positional parameter).

remarks.para: Subclass this converter and pass the discriminator property name and type map to the base constructor. Apply [JsonConverter(typeof(YourConverter))] on the abstract record base type.
The discriminator property is matched case-insensitively during deserialization, consistent with . Discriminator values are matched exactly (case-sensitive) since they are machine identifiers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.DiscriminatedRecordConverter`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Type})
member.summary: Initializes the converter with a discriminator property name and a mapping from discriminator string values to concrete types.
member.param: The JSON property name used as the type discriminator (e.g., "type"). Matched case-insensitively during deserialization.
Maps discriminator values to their corresponding concrete types. All mapped types must be assignable to .
member.exception: Thrown when any mapped type is not assignable to .

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.DiscriminatedRecordConverter`1.FindDiscriminator(System.Text.Json.JsonElement)
member.summary: Scans the JSON object for the discriminator property (case-insensitive).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.DiscriminatedRecordConverter`1.GetOptionsWithoutSelf(System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the given options with this converter removed to prevent infinite recursion. Cached per options instance (typically one: BannouJson.Options).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.IBannouEvent
member.summary: Base interface for all Bannou events (both service-to-service and client events). All events in the system implement this interface, enabling uniform handling in message taps and event processing pipelines.

remarks.para: This interface defines the minimal contract for all events: - EventId: Unique identifier for deduplication and tracing - Timestamp: When the event was created - EventName: The type/name of the event

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.IBannouEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance. Used for deduplication, tracing, and correlation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.IBannouEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When the event was created (UTC).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Core.IBannouEvent.EventName
member.summary: The type/name of the event - usually also the topic it's published on.
